radiographic_examinations.findings: Trace bilateral pleural effusions, gallstones in the gallbladder with mild gallbladder wall edema, mildly prominent pancreatic head with slight increase in diffusion signal abnormality, normal pancreas duct, no suspicious focal liver lesion, a small simple renal cyst in the right kidney, and two round T2 hyperintense lesions in lower thoracic vertebral bodies likely representing hemangiomas.
